title: [Self-Directed] Science Library Information Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic research skills, completion of university-level science curriculum
context.additional_context: Operated in smartphone-enabled limited-technology environments with a formative assessment-centered feedback system.

learning_goals: Learners can search for topic-relevant academic papers in scientific databases with over 80% accuracy
Learners can identify and evaluate at least three credible scientific information sources
Learners can systematically organize research findings using reference management tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
